simplified: 是骡子是马，拉出来遛遛

pronunciation.pinyin: shì luó zi shì mǎ , lā chū lai liù liu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , la1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5

details.simplified: 是骡子是马，拉出来遛遛
details.traditional: 是騾子是馬，拉出來遛遛

meanings.value: see 是騾子是馬，牽出來遛遛|是骡子是马，牵出来遛遛[shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , qian1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5]
